oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-08-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 1, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performers Cousin Jody and his Country Cousins, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1034th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Ray Price; Cousin Jody; Country Cousins; Stringbean; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Ray Price) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Cousin Jody -- I Never See Maggie Alone (Cousin Jody and his Country Cousins) -- Grant Turner introduces Stringbean -- I Wonder Where Wanda Went (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- A Satisfied Mind (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Jackson, Tommy; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jordanaires (Musical group); Bowes, Margie; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Wagoner, Porter; Cousin Jody; Country Cousins (Musical group : Cousin Jody)
